verses.verse: Moreover he said<WH559> unto me, Son<WH1121> of man<WH120>, eat<WH398> that thou findest<WH4672>; eat<WH398> this roll<WH4039>, and go<WH3212> speak<WH1696> unto the house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478>.
So I opened<WH6605> my mouth<WH6310>, and he caused me to eat<WH398> that roll<WH4039>.

And he said<WH559> unto me, Son<WH1121> of man<WH120>, cause thy belly<WH990> to eat<WH398>, and fill<WH4390> thy bowels<WH4578> with this roll<WH4039> that I give<WH5414> thee. Then did I eat<WH398> it; and it was in my mouth<WH6310> as honey<WH1706> for sweetness<WH4966>.
¶ And he said<WH559> unto me, Son<WH1121> of man<WH120>, go<WH3212>, get<WH935> thee unto the house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478>, and speak<WH1696> with my words<WH1697> unto them.
For thou art not sent<WH7971> to a people<WH5971> of a strange<WH6012> speech<WH8193> and of an hard<WH3515> language<WH3956>, but to the house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478>;

Not to many<WH7227> people<WH5971> of a strange<WH6012> speech<WH8193> and of an hard<WH3515> language<WH3956>, whose words<WH1697> thou canst not understand<WH8085>. Surely, had I sent<WH7971> thee to them, they would have hearkened<WH8085> unto thee.

But the house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478> will<WH14> not hearken<WH8085> unto thee; for they will<WH14> not hearken<WH8085> unto me: for all the house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478> are impudent<WH2389><WH4696> and hardhearted<WH7186><WH3820>.
Behold, I have made<WH5414> thy face<WH6440> strong<WH2389> against<WH5980> their faces<WH6440>, and thy forehead<WH4696> strong<WH2389> against<WH5980> their foreheads<WH4696>.

As an adamant<WH8068> harder<WH2389> than flint<WH6864> have I made<WH5414> thy forehead<WH4696>: fear<WH3372> them not, neither be dismayed<WH2865> at their looks<WH6440>, though they be a rebellious<WH4805> house<WH1004>.
Moreover he said<WH559> unto me, Son<WH1121> of man<WH120>, all my words<WH1697> that I shall speak<WH1696> unto thee receive<WH3947> in thine heart<WH3824>, and hear<WH8085> with thine ears<WH241>.

And go<WH3212>, get<WH935> thee to them of the captivity<WH1473>, unto the children<WH1121> of thy people<WH5971>, and speak<WH1696> unto them, and tell<WH559> them, Thus saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD<WH3069>; whether they will hear<WH8085>, or whether they will forbear<WH2308>.

Then the spirit<WH7307> took me up<WH5375>, and I heard<WH8085> behind<WH310> me a voice<WH6963> of a great<WH1419> rushing<WH7494>, saying, Blessed<WH1288> be the glory<WH3519> of the LORD<WH3068> from his place<WH4725>.

I heard also the noise<WH6963> of the wings<WH3671> of the living creatures<WH2416> that touched<WH5401> one<WH802> another<WH269>, and the noise<WH6963> of the wheels<WH212> over against<WH5980> them, and a noise<WH6963> of a great<WH1419> rushing<WH7494>.

So the spirit<WH7307> lifted me up<WH5375>, and took me away<WH3947>, and I went<WH3212> in bitterness<WH4751>, in the heat<WH2534> of my spirit<WH7307>; but the hand<WH3027> of the LORD<WH3068> was strong<WH2388> upon me.

¶ Then I came<WH935> to them of the captivity<WH1473> at Tel-abib<WH8512>, that dwelt<WH3427> by the river<WH5104> of Chebar<WH3529>, and I sat<WH3427> where they sat<WH3427>, and remained<WH3427> there astonished<WH8074> among<WH8432> them seven<WH7651> days<WH3117>.
And it came to pass at the end<WH7097> of seven<WH7651> days<WH3117>, that the word<WH1697> of the LORD<WH3068> came unto me, saying<WH559>,

Son<WH1121> of man<WH120>, I have made<WH5414> thee a watchman<WH6822> unto the house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478>: therefore hear<WH8085> the word<WH1697> at my mouth<WH6310>, and give them warning<WH2094> from me.

When I say<WH559> unto the wicked<WH7563>, Thou shalt surely<WH4191> die<WH4191>; and thou givest him not warning<WH2094>, nor speakest<WH1696> to warn<WH2094> the wicked<WH7563> from his wicked<WH7563> way<WH1870>, to save his life<WH2421>; the same wicked<WH7563> man shall die<WH4191> in his iniquity<WH5771>; but his blood<WH1818> will I require<WH1245> at thine hand<WH3027>.

Yet if thou warn<WH2094> the wicked<WH7563>, and he turn<WH7725> not from his wickedness<WH7562>, nor from his wicked<WH7563> way<WH1870>, he shall die<WH4191> in his iniquity<WH5771>; but thou hast delivered<WH5337> thy soul<WH5315>.

Again<WH7725>, When a righteous<WH6662> man doth turn<WH7725> from his righteousness<WH6664>, and commit<WH6213> iniquity<WH5766>, and I lay<WH5414> a stumblingblock<WH4383> before<WH6440> him, he shall die<WH4191>: because thou hast not given him warning<WH2094>, he shall die<WH4191> in his sin<WH2403>, and his righteousness<WH6666> which he hath done<WH6213> shall not be remembered<WH2142>; but his blood<WH1818> will I require<WH1245> at thine hand<WH3027>.

Nevertheless if thou warn<WH2094> the righteous<WH6662> man, that the righteous<WH6662> sin<WH2398> not, and he doth not sin<WH2398>, he shall surely<WH2421> live<WH2421>, because he is warned<WH2094>; also thou hast delivered<WH5337> thy soul<WH5315>.
¶ And the hand<WH3027> of the LORD<WH3068> was there upon me; and he said<WH559> unto me, Arise<WH6965>, go forth<WH3318> into the plain<WH1237>, and I will there talk<WH1696> with thee.

Then I arose<WH6965>, and went forth<WH3318> into the plain<WH1237>: and, behold, the glory<WH3519> of the LORD<WH3068> stood<WH5975> there, as the glory<WH3519> which I saw<WH7200> by the river<WH5104> of Chebar<WH3529>: and I fell<WH5307> on my face<WH6440>.

Then the spirit<WH7307> entered<WH935> into me, and set<WH5975> me upon my feet<WH7272>, and spake<WH1696> with me, and said<WH559> unto me, Go<WH935>, shut<WH5462> thyself within<WH8432> thine house<WH1004>.
But thou, O son<WH1121> of man<WH120>, behold, they shall put<WH5414> bands<WH5688> upon thee, and shall bind<WH631> thee with them, and thou shalt not go out<WH3318> among<WH8432> them:

And I will make thy tongue<WH3956> cleave<WH1692> to the roof of thy mouth<WH2441>, that thou shalt be dumb<WH481>, and shalt not be to them a reprover<WH376><WH3198>: for they are a rebellious<WH4805> house<WH1004>.

But when I speak<WH1696> with<WH854> thee, I will open<WH6605> thy mouth<WH6310>, and thou shalt say<WH559> unto them, Thus saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD<WH3069>; He that heareth<WH8085>, let him hear<WH8085>; and he that forbeareth<WH2310>, let him forbear<WH2308>: for they are a rebellious<WH4805> house<WH1004>.
